text: (Iska pata tumhein us roz chal jayega ) jab ijtima (will assemble you )ke din woh tum sabko ikattha karega. Woh din hoga ek dusre ke muqable mein logon ki haar jeet ka. Jo Allah par iman laya hai aur neik amal karta hai, Allah uske gunah jhaad dega aur usey aisi jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi. Yeh log hamesha hamesha inmein rahenge. Yahi badi kamiyabi hai
